article.headline: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A stock rises Friday, still underperforms market
article.body: Shares of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A BRK.A, +0.06% inched 0.06% higher to $323,470.00 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.88% to 3,477.14 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.57% to 28,586.90. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. Berkshire Hathaway Inc. Cl A closed $23,930.00 short of its 52-week high ($347,400.00), which the company achieved on January 17th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Honeywell International Inc. HON, +0.34% rose 0.35% to $174.38, 3M Co. MMM, +0.94% rose 0.95% to $169.30, and General Electric Co. GE, +2.85% rose 2.86% to $6.84. Trading volume (193) remained 201 below its 50-day average volume of 394.
